message: The US sprayed carcinogenic pesticides on California grape harvesters decades ago. The same systemic pesticide in Canada is regulated to not be applied for at least three weeks prior to harvest. The USA without warning to parents or other adults, aerial spray above pedestrians on side walks & childrens school grounds. My son worked for Sendiks all through high school & college. During the school vacations & every summer he worked full time & even got a Christmas bonus. He loved working for them & was treated well. Maybe not offering full time work to someone is a way of getting rid of employees who aren't working out well. He was pd $8.00 an hr, which was way over minimum wage then.
